item.title: BnaA07.NTT1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g38360D Gene Symbol: BnaA07.NTT1a Gene Name: Genome: B.

item.title: CsPLDα
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsPLDα Gene Name: Phospholipase D alpha Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Cucumber Phospholipase D alpha (CsPLDα) gene overexpression in tobacco enhanced drought stress tolerance by regulating stomatal closure and lipid peroxidation.

item.title: GmPLDγ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01g42420 Gene Symbol: GmPLDγ Gene Name: Genome: Glyma.

item.title: GPAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GPAT Gene Name: glycerol-3-phosphate acyltransferase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of Sweet Pepper Glycerol-3-Phosphate Acyltransferase Gene Enhanced Thermotolerance of Photosynthetic Apparatus in Transgenic Tobacco.

item.title: MS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G281800 Gene Symbol: MS2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation of MS2 confers male fertility and drives hybrid breeding in soybean.

item.title: PHYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g053410 Gene Symbol: PHYB2 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: POWR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.20G085100 Gene Symbol: POWR1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: POWR1 is a domestication gene pleiotropically regulating seed quality and yield in soybean.

item.title: PuMYB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB21 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: PuMYB54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PuMYB54 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 21 Genome: Species: Pyrus ussuriensis Functional Descriptions: PuMYB21 and PuMYB54, from “Nanguo” pears, which were notably expressed in response to cold stress and during the peel-browning process.

item.title: SlKLUH
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g114940 Gene Symbol: SlKLUH Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Differential expression of SlKLUH controlling fruit and seed weight is associated with changes in lipid metabolism and photosynthesis-related genes.

item.title: SlTBP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g015080 Gene Symbol: SlTBP Gene Name: tocopherol-binding protein Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlTBP encodes a chloroplast-targeted protein of the patellin family and is highly expressed in green tissues.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc10g054870 Gene Symbol: SlTPI1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlTPI2

item.title: VvCBF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvCBF4 Gene Name: C-repeat binding protein 4 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: To overcome such production losses, a recently identified grapevine C-repeat binding factor (CBF) gene, VvCBF4, was overexpressed in grape vine cv.
